statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_capacity, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE distance_traveled > 500;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_consumed BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, MAX(fuel_consumed) AS max_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' AND distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_type, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, distance_traveled FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Petrol' ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, date_time FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_type LIKE 'SUV%' AND fuel_capacity >= 50 AND fuel_consumed < 200 ORDER BY fuel_consumed ASC;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT MAX(fuel_amount) FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT mode_name, description FROM TransportationModes WHERE mode_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_amount, mileage, date_recorded FROM FuelConsumption
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type='Gasoline' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT mode_name, description FROM TransportationModes WHERE mode_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumption FROM FuelConsumption WHERE date_recorded >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, mileage FROM FuelConsumption WHERE mileage > 10000 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY fuel_type DESC, consumption_date ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE model_year > 2010
SELECT fuel_type, SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_amount FROM FuelConsumption GROUP BY fuel_type
SELECT * FROM TransportationModes
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_amount, consumption_date FROM FuelConsumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline' AND fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY fuel_amount DESC;

SELECT Vehicles.*, FuelConsumption.* FROM Vehicles INNER JOIN FuelConsumption ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = FuelConsumption.vehicle_id WHERE Vehicles.manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND FuelConsumption.fuel_type = 'Diesel' ORDER BY FuelConsumption.consumption_date ASC;

SELECT TransportationModes.mode_name, AVG(FuelConsumption.fuel_amount) AS avg_fuel_amount FROM TransportationModes LEFT JOIN FuelConsumption ON TransportationModes.mode_id = FuelConsumption.vehicle_id GROUP BY TransportationModes.mode_name HAVING avg_fuel_amount > 70;

SELECT manufacturer, model_year, SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM Vehicles LEFT JOIN FuelConsumption ON Vehicles.vehicle_id = FuelConsumption.vehicle_id GROUP BY manufacturer, model_year ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance_travelled FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_quantity, fuel_price FROM fuel_records WHERE fuel_quantity > 100 ORDER BY fuel_date ASC;
SELECT trip_id, fuel_efficiency, emissions FROM fuel_analysis WHERE fuel_efficiency > 25 AND emissions < 100 ORDER BY trip_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY fuel_capacity DESC;
SELECT trip_date, start_location, end_location, distance_travelled FROM trips WHERE distance_travelled > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_date, fuel_quantity, fuel_price FROM fuel_records WHERE fuel_price < 2.5;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumptionDataForCars;
SELECT car_brand, car_model, fuel_type FROM FuelConsumptionDataForBikes ORDER BY bike_brand DESC;
SELECT fuel_type, mileage FROM FuelConsumptionDataForPlanes WHERE distance_travelled > 1000;
SELECT ship_type, fuel_consumed FROM FuelConsumptionDataForShips WHERE fuel_consumed < 500 ORDER BY distance_travelled ASC;
SELECT train_model, fuel_consumed, distance_travelled FROM FuelConsumptionDataForTrains WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT car_brand, car_model, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, mileage FROM FuelConsumptionDataForCars WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT bike_brand, bike_model, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, mileage FROM FuelConsumptionDataForBikes ORDER BY bike_brand ASC, fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT plane_manufacturer, plane_model, fuel_type, distance_travelled FROM FuelConsumptionDataForPlanes WHERE distance_travelled > 10000 ORDER BY distance_travelled DESC;
SELECT ship_name, ship_type, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, distance_travelled FROM FuelConsumptionDataForShips WHERE fuel_consumed < 500 ORDER BY distance_travelled ASC;

SELECT train_company, train_model, fuel_type, distance_travelled FROM FuelConsumptionDataForTrains WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' AND distance_travelled BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY train_company DESC;
